title: [QUESTION] SkiaSharp Unity error
body:
Hello.

I'm using a tool called 'NuGetForUnity'. This tool makes it easier to install NuGet packages within Unity. With this tool, I am trying to install 'QuestPDF'. QuestPDF needs SkiaSharp.
NuGetForUnity also downloads this neatly, but now I get tis error:

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/24845278/180036825-d8da16a7-f978-427a-b479-b9b308a1d194.png)

These are all the packages that are installed when I installed QuestPDF:

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/24845278/180037053-1c6f06cc-7fe1-4f2a-81e5-7ba50032c0bc.png)


Is there a way to solve this?
